verses.text: \w An|strong="H3068"\w* oracle \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart regarding \w the|strong="H3068"\w* transgression \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wicked man: \w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no fear \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* before \w his|strong="H3068"\w* eyes.\f + \fr 36:1 \ft Cited in Romans 3:18\f*

\w For|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* too full \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w conceit|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* detect or hate \w his|strong="H7130"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w sin|strong="H6588"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* words \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mouth \w are|strong="H5869"\w* wicked \w and|strong="H5869"\w* deceitful; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* ceased \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* wise \w and|strong="H5869"\w* well-doing.

Even \w on|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H6310"\w* bed \w he|strong="H6310"\w* plots wickedness; \w he|strong="H6310"\w* sets \w himself|strong="H7919"\w* \w on|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* path \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H2308"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w*; \w he|strong="H6310"\w* fails \w to|strong="H1697"\w* reject evil.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w loving|strong="H2896"\w* devotion, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, reaches \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heavens, \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* faithfulness \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* clouds.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w highest|strong="H8064"\w* mountains; \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* judgments \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w like|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* deepest sea. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w You|strong="H5704"\w* preserve man \w and|strong="H3068"\w* beast.

How precious \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving devotion, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H7227"\w* \w take|strong="H4941"\w* refuge \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* wings!

\w They|strong="H4100"\w* feast \w on|strong="H3671"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Your|strong="H4100"\w* house, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w You|strong="H4100"\w* give \w them|strong="H1121"\w* drink \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Your|strong="H4100"\w* river \w of|strong="H1121"\w* delights.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w You|strong="H8248"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H1004"\w* life; \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Your|strong="H8248"\w* light \w we|strong="H3068"\w* see light.

Extend \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w those|strong="H5973"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* know \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w Your|strong="H7200"\w* righteousness \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* upright \w in|strong="H7200"\w* heart.

Let \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* foot \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* proud \w come|strong="H3045"\w* against \w me|strong="H4900"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* wicked drive \w me|strong="H4900"\w* \w away|strong="H4900"\w*.
There \w the|strong="H3027"\w* evildoers lie fallen, thrown \w down|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* unable \w to|strong="H3027"\w* rise.
